Articles.Content:
So when creating a node or going IP it only shows 2 future orbits. How do you change that? I want to make it like 5. Iwant to do this because i am testing the efficiency of doing a Munar slingshot out to IP space.

Edited June 21, 2013 by bigpapabearxx
Go into your settings.cfg in your main KSP folder. Change CONIC_PATCH_LIMIT to 5. Any more than that and you'll start getting performance issues.
